name.en: Special Seminar in Smart Manufacturing and Management

goal.ch:
工業4.0的目標是創建智能工廠，通過物聯網，資通訊技術，雲計算，大數據分析等對製造技術進行升級和改造。該課程介紹了這些技術的基本概念、實際用途、案例研究以及製造系統的規劃與控制。本課程將重點放在討論智能製造中的管理和技術方面，包含三個主要的教學目標：
1.學習有關管理智能製造系統的最新知識，特別是放在系統的決策和業務方面。通過廣泛的閱讀和課堂講授，學生將了解最佳實踐。
2.培養學生解決智能製造問題時進行分析和戰略思考的能力，透過準備和介紹該領域中幾個特定主題來完成。
3.通過閱讀著名期刊的精選評論和/或調查文章，將學生介紹到管理智能系統的研究議程中。
goal.en:
The goal of Industry 4.0 is to create a smart factory to upgrade and transform manufacturing technology through the Internet of Things, information and communication technology, cloud computing, big data analysis, and scheduling. The course introduces the basic concepts, practical uses, case studies, and planning and control of manufacturing systems of these technologies. This course will focus on discussing the managerial and technical aspects of smart manufacturing, with three main pedagogical goals:
1. Learn the latest knowledge about managing intelligent manufacturing systems, especially on the decision-making and business aspects of the system. Through extensive reading and classroom lectures, students will learn about best practices.
2. Develop students‘ ability to analyze and think strategically when solving intelligent manufacturing problems by preparing and introducing several specific topics in the field.
3. Introduce students to the research agenda of managing intelligent systems by reading selected reviews and investigative articles in prestigious journals.
